control_attributes.control_description: The information system: a. Uses internal system clocks to generate time stamps for audit records; andb. Records time stamps for audit records that can be mapped to Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) or Greenwich Mean Time (GMT) and meets [Assignment: organization-defined granularity of time measurement].
control_attributes.Control_description: The information system terminates shared/group account credentials when members leave the group.

Control Statement: The information system: a. Uses internal system clocks to generate time stamps for audit records; andb. Records time stamps for audit records that can be mapped to Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) or Greenwich Mean Time (GMT) and meets [Assignment: organization-defined granularity of time measurement].
